name: 阿伦·戴伯通
awards: 2019年 第22届上海国际电影节 金爵奖 最佳影片 (提名) 痴梦芭蕾
introduction: Producer, director and screenwriter, graduated in Cinema at the Fluminense Federal University (UFF - RJ). Directed the awarded films "Coconut Sweet" (CE, 2010), "The Best Friend" (2013), "Arthur's Eyes" (2016). Altogether the aforementioned films took part in more than 100 international and national film festivals and received 49 awards. In 2015, produced the first Broadway musical in Ceará, "Avenue Q", sponsored by Correios. Since 2013, has been producing the Project "Broadway Brasil" in partnership with "Broadway Dreams Foundation (USA)". In 2015, produced the feature documentary "The Other Side of the Atlantic" by Márcio Câmara and Daniele Ellery and presented at SpCine. In 2017, produced to EBC the TV series "Lana & Carol" by Samuel Brasileiro and Natalia Maia (Prodav 9/15); the feature film "Eternal Comeback" by Lília Moema (Prodecine 1/15); produced and wrote the lyrics from "The Hour of the Star - The Musical", based on Clarice Lispector's work and sponsored by Caixa. Currently produces his first feature film as a director, "Pacarrete", which was chosen by FSA/Minc public notice and develops the feature films "The Best Friend", "Coconut Sweet", "Meire Love" and the TV series "Salon 190". (1/25/18)
